name: BOBA BUDS DX
description:
Originally produced as an exclusive reward for backers of the Wonderville Kickstarter campaign, BOBA BUDS is a 4-player racing game where players pilot their chosen tapioca pearl through a surreal, vaporwave-inspired snackworld to be the first to splash into the sweet bubble tea goal. Bound, boost, and jump your way to victory but watch out for Baby Huey!

This never-before-seen DX version features a reworked third-person perspective and up to four split-screens!

BOBA BUDS DX requires at least one Xbox One-style controller to play
